sn45.28:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you noble right samādhi with its vital conditions and its prerequisites.
sn45.28:4.4: And what is noble right samādhi with its vital conditions and its prerequisites?
sn45.28:4.6: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
sn45.28:4.8: Unification of mind with these seven factors as prerequisites is called noble right samādhi ‘with its vital conditions’ and ‘with its prerequisites’.”
